post.body:
**Who should decide what is offensive? If you believe in Freedom of Speech - the answer is clearly no one.**

There have been many discussions lately about implementing a mandatory ‚Äúoffensive‚Äù category for guilds that admins and some users believe fit this category.

It has been confirmed today that this ‚Äúoffensive‚Äù category will be COMPULSORY despite the assertions of @captainmeta4 to the contrary‚Ä¶

![](https://files.catbox.moe/c5p9s4.png)

COMPULSORY to me means it will be enforced one way or another - this is clearly the intent from the above response. 

I also believe ALL content should be OPT-OUT to prevent censorship by default.

**An OPT-IN for any category leaves open the possibility a user is unaware their content is being censored - *manipulated* - without their express consent.**

I believe this kind of manipulation to be deeply wrong. We have all seen the affects of this to different degrees in our real lives and online. 

### What am I calling on ALL GMs of good faith to do in response to this? - Change your guild category to ‚Äúoffensive‚Äù NOW.

In a show of solitary for our belief in Freedom of Speech and in support of each other - this is the only honourable course of action.

This will mean none of our guilds will show in ALL by default, leaving the front page barren of any content of substance.

I believe this action by admins is clearly in contravention of their principles as stated in the ‚ÄúPhilosophy of Ruqqus.‚Äù It is these stated principles that have brought many, if not the majority, of us here. Designating all our guilds as ‚Äúoffensive‚Äù is a way we can hold them accountable to these principles.

The question now is, do we stand by what we believe? If so, let‚Äôs stick together. 

**I will not cede any more ground to the cancer that is CENSORSHIP.**

post.body:
Knowing your enemy is necessary to fight them effectively.

About ten years ago on reddit a subreddit called ShitRedditSays was created by SomethingAweful users. Its stated goal was to stomp out misogyny and other badthink on reddit. 

Back then reddit was a pretty nice place. Those were the days of Ron Paul and the place was full of techies and libertarians. You could speak your mind in larger subreddits without being instantly banned. Free speech was still something that was universally valued.

The actual goals of SRS were entirely different. Let's say you and a small group of your friends wanted to take down reddit. How would you go about it? A direct attack would surely fail. But there are tactics that work against larger institutions, and that is using the weaknesses of that institution to make it attack itself from within. 

Their tactics included:

 - Coordination outside of reddit
 - Mass reporting of posts and subreddits
 - Coordinating with the media to publish hit pieces
 - Attacking fringe communities
 - False flag attacks: posting content that was illegal or against reddit rules to get subreddits banned
 - Kept lists of users and subreddits to target
 - Worked with reddit admins or had admin sympathizers

I'm sure there were other, more nefarious tactics used, but I haven't witnessed them personally.

They seem to derive pleasure from exercising their power and destroying what others have built. They are the kind of people who find pleasure in destroying another kid's sandcastle rather than building their own.

Other subreddits were created later, like AgainstHateSubreddits, which used similar tactics. 

Partly through their efforts reddit is what it is today.

That brings us to the cabal that has infested ruqqus. It's obvious they are they same people, if not physically, then in spirit. Their stated goal is ridding ruqqus of nazis and other wrongthink (Ruqqus Correction Project). They keep a [list of badthink guilds](https://ruqqus.com/+AgainstChudGuilds/post/372n/how-to-detox-your-feed-a). They seize guilds with the sole purpose of destroying them, as we've seen recently with +HitlerWasRight and others. They coordinate offsite on discord. 

Behind their outwardly "noble" goals of ridding ruqqus of "nazis" is the same desire to destroy. If they are ever successful at getting rid of "nazis" they will just find some other fringe group to attack. They will not stop until ruqqus is dead.

post.body:
Long story short, admins and a majority of Ruqqus Discord strongly dislike the current ‚Äúnazi‚Äù - yeah, they use that term unironically - userbase. A good amount of Ruqqord users want to shit on and drive users they don‚Äôt like off the site and admins seem to want to replace their base and cater to a more mainstream audience. These users for all intents and purposes hate Ruqqus and Ruqqus users, would be happier on Reddit, and are consistently (purposely) demoralizing when it doesn‚Äôt make sense to be. Yet the admins seem more than willing to take cues from them.

So you have users that are generally popular or at least neutral with the Ruqqus base getting eyed, jumped on, and treated spitefully by the admins because the Ruqqord base hates and constantly complains about those users. Yet, you‚Äôve got those same Ruqqord users in the RCP server planning brigades, sieging and subverting guilds of users they get banned, playing Carps games and being obnoxious to everybody else and the Admins do nothing.

The admins always side with Ruqqord over the Ruqqus base. Because they don‚Äôt like the Ruqqus base. And, Ruqqord is really just a few loud, whiny people typing the same thing over and over and then the rest just falling in line after they know what to think.

Basically, it seems like they want Reddit‚Äôs userbase and resent the niche that they already have and can build upon because it doesn‚Äôt make Ruqqus look favorable to the mainstream. They don‚Äôt want to promote Ruqqus and refuse to market it until they‚Äôve released Vue and are better able to hide the ‚Äúundesirables.‚Äù

So, if it feels like there‚Äôs animosity towards a bunch of the users here and like they‚Äôre working against you, they kind of are.

That is my experience and take away from being in the Ruqqord

post.body:
Knowing your enemy is necessary to fight them effectively.

About ten years ago on reddit a subreddit called ShitRedditSays was created by SomethingAweful users. Its stated goal was to stomp out misogyny and other badthink on reddit. 

Back then reddit was a pretty nice place. Those were the days of Ron Paul and the place was full of techies and libertarians. You could speak your mind in larger subreddits without being instantly banned. Free speech was still something that was universally valued.

The actual goals of SRS were entirely different. Let's say you and a small group of your friends wanted to take down reddit. How would you go about it? A direct attack would surely fail. But there are tactics that work against larger institutions, and that is using the weaknesses of that institution to make it attack itself from within. 

Their tactics included:

 - Coordination outside of reddit
 - Mass reporting of posts and subreddits
 - Coordinating with the media to publish hit pieces
 - Attacking fringe communities
 - False flag attacks: posting content that was illegal or against reddit rules to get subreddits banned
 - Kept lists of users and subreddits to target
 - Worked with reddit admins or had admin sympathizers

I'm sure there were other, more nefarious tactics used, but I haven't witnessed them personally.

They seem to derive pleasure from exercising their power and destroying what others have built. They are the kind of people who find pleasure in destroying another kid's sandcastle rather than building their own.

Other subreddits were created later, like AgainstHateSubreddits, which used similar tactics. 

Partly through their efforts reddit is what it is today.

That brings us to the cabal that has infested ruqqus. It's obvious they are they same people, if not physically, then in spirit. Their stated goal is ridding ruqqus of nazis and other wrongthink (Ruqqus Correction Project). They keep a [list of badthink guilds](https://ruqqus.com/+AgainstChudGuilds/post/372n/how-to-detox-your-feed-a). They seize guilds with the sole purpose of destroying them, as we've seen recently with +HitlerWasRight and others. They coordinate offsite on discord. 

Behind their outwardly "noble" goals of ridding ruqqus of "nazis" is the same desire to destroy. If they are ever successful at getting rid of "nazis" they will just find some other fringe group to attack. They will not stop until ruqqus is dead.

parent.body:
No, governments do not have an obligation to be impartial. They have an obligation not to be partial to their own interests, but the interests of the people. However, within the people, they do and should prioritise their own supporters (which is why centre-right parties implement measures that favour the middle class while far left parties (supposedly) implement measures that favour the lower class). Whether that can be considered "impartial" is up to each person's interpretation.

In either case, even if we do accept that governments have to be impartial, the "government" here are the administrators, not the guildmasters. The guildmasters are more like landlords, which do what they want on their own property.

body:
> Do you not hear yourself? You're comparing groups to a single you and you're an exceptional case, INFPs are quite rare.

And what if there are black people or females who are too? You express distaste for their "normal" state, but then propose laws forcing the ones who aren't to conform to it!

> Nature can't afford to gamble with women which is why they are the safe option, which is why most of their normal distributions (IQ, etc.) lie closer to the average than for men.

Or maybe it's because they make no sense and have a strange obsession with acting as girly as possible at all times. When you use a sample who actually acts normal the difference disappears in my experience; if anything they are usually a bit *more* intelligent than the men, which is just as dumb but that's just how it is.

> I don't see absolutely anything remarkable about acikek or no_chill, for all I've known of them they're just basic bitches. Not as familiar with other two and Seq37 seems like a fairly normal case of a developer mindset. I suggest you tone your swooning down a little, it feels a bit creepy.

Acikek is a teenager who is amazing at programming, much more than me who has also been obsessed with it. no_chill joined 5 weeks ago and already got 28 followers, posts super well, and already created the most popular guild, and is funny. Seq is literally good at everything like sfrohne is, just not as shy and not quite as amazing and faultless, but still a lot.

> Find a single sport where women beat men, I'll wait.

Ah yes, athletic performance determines everything else

> They have to play in separate leagues even in chess.

Well then that's just stupid, and I know for a fact sfrohne would crush me every time if we played any kind of strategy game

> And how do you know what is good and what is not?

> And what does give you the right to control everyone if not that?

*Nothing* does!

> You yourself admit some people are more exceptional than others, especially than you, would you not want such people at the helm?

The mighty ones aren't always the best people, in fact they usually aren't, and even if they were they still don't have a right to force their will on others, those people would just be better off if they listened.

> That applies to Africa too and it's a huge shithole with 0 media. It is their nature and genetic analysis proves that.

Because Africa is wilderness where any race would act like that.

> Planning ahead and simulating outcomes takes a good amount of brain power, which is very well correlated with IQ and there are barely any women at all past the 130 IQ mark due to their normal distribution. The downside is that there are more men below the 80 mark too.

So if it's just a matter of distribution, and there are more men who are stupid despite more smarter ones, then how does that make all men automatically better? You admit this means more stupid men too, so your idea that it always makes women always substard makes no sense.

> I never said explicitly a law should be put in place to enforce it, simple societal discouragement will be enough.

Okay that's better. As long as you're not trying to force your will on someone else. But you said earlier that we need to deny freedom to women and blacks and jews.

> Currently it is encouraged, glorified (falsely so, there is no glory in dried ovaries and loneliness for fooled 40-year old women)

Actually there is, singleness is in fact a gift and not everyone can recieve it.

> and diversity quotas are enforced by law.

Yeah those are bullshit. SJWs go on and on about "racist sexist misogynist homophobic transphobic islamaphobic bigots", yet they're the ones insisting we make decisions based on these attributes.

> Even men don't play strategy games that often, women even less so, especially grand strategy, and, guess what, those require long-term planning to win along with a strong attention span.

Like I said, it's because most women are just weird and girly.

> Jews maybe, but others nah.

I literally gave you several examples, and you're blatantly choosing to ignore them because it doesn't confirm your fascist utopia.

> Sorry about the wording, what I wanted to ask is how much you actually enjoy playing them

I would enjoy them a lot, if I could actually do them.

> And lemme tell you something, prejudices are actually GOOD, because, if the prejudice is wrong, it only gives you opportunity to rise up further than you could if you're a decent person (say you become a 6 from a -2, it's an 8 point rise compared to a 6 from 0).

I don't really get what you're saying here.

> Who said Jesus is a villain? I'd much rather call those who killed him villains and I think you can guess who that is.

They were, and they were *his own people*. I'm not surprised you wouldn't like him, he had quite a bit of concern for people you seem to think are worthless (ironically you have much in common with da joos who got him crucified because that is one of the things they hated about him). I bet you think he's the pinnacle of Jewish brainwashing.

> Yeah, we can only guess, but judging by how successful his country was during his short reign until it got ganged upon by the entire world, I tend to think he was a good genius with good intentions.

Or he was just obsessed with power and success. If having a more efficient society costs your entire well-being and causes you to live in terror every second of your life and give up your freedom in almost every aspect, is that really worth it? I wouldn't make that trade-off.

> How is that unfortunate? It increases biodiversity and makes things more fun.

It's only fun for the people who have the advantages.

> Also, you do realise that a genius woman would be more useful if she produced genius children than if she burned away at some useless job?

You could say the same exact thing about a man. I'd also like to add, your idea of meaning seems is purely biological and you seem to have no spiritual discernment.

> neural networks can very easily determine your race by scaling your genetics

Yes, by looking at that trait, not your other ones.

> there aren't trillions of traits, lmao, there aren't even that many alleles.

If that's the case then how is everyone unique except identical twins? By your logic there should be several clones of everyone.

> You can refuse a burger, but how often do you choose to, especially when suffering no punishment?

Again, there are people who do and it's not fair to judge them by others' actions. I myself am often annoyed by stuff that everyone else just does.

> And that's just one gene of which there are many, which are more prevalent in blacks than whites or vice versa.

You just got done saying there's only a few genes that determine everything!

> Just watch your TV and physically count how many times there is a black man with a white woman in an ad.

That's called woke college SJWs who are 90% white men, not jews.

> https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Skeleton_in_the_closet_(idiom)

Everyone's got that, but I'm not sure how that relates to this. They are very clearly ultra excelling, some of them damn near perfect in almost every area, and what they've done proves it. I don't know what could change that fact, even if they turn out to be awful people (I doubt it knowing them) the fact that they excel to the point of insanity still remains.

post.body:
It's undeniable that the central tenets of the (US) conservatives used to be small, limited government, states rights, individual liberty, free markets, free speech, etc. With a few exceptions (such as the war on drugs and the death penalty), conservatives were basically a more moderate version of libertarian, and there was a lot of spillover from one to the other.

However in the past few years that has definitely changed. I haven't seen it in its purest form since about a decade ago or maybe even before that, but it's really picked up in the past 1-2 years. Conservatives are now suddenly demanding a strong state, control of the people, censorship, tough laws banning things they determined have a negative impact on society, more restricted individual rights, etc. They've basically become the left with a right-wing agenda. This was a really fast change and it's been shocking to me; I still have trouble believing it. What's the hardest is seeing all my conservative friends changing at once and suddenly going from mostly believers in freedom to solid authoritarians in a really short time. Their fundamental philosophy is such the opposite of what it was, and to me this major shift in thinking is a complete mystery. Ironically, they now closely resemble Joe Biden in his younger days of politics. Of course I still know of many people who believe in the old philosophy, but the majority of their former allies no longer do and now regard them as traitors. I can't wrap my head around what's going on here. Big brother is now watching you from both sides. So to the current conservatives out there, what made you decide this is necessary?
post.body_html:
It's undeniable that the central tenets of the (US) conservatives used to be small, limited government, states rights, individual liberty, free markets, free speech, etc. With a few exceptions (such as the war on drugs and the death penalty), conservatives were basically a more moderate version of libertarian, and there was a lot of spillover from one to the other.

However in the past few years that has definitely changed. I haven't seen it in its purest form since about a decade ago or maybe even before that, but it's really picked up in the past 1-2 years. Conservatives are now suddenly demanding a strong state, control of the people, censorship, tough laws banning things they determined have a negative impact on society, more restricted individual rights, etc. They've basically become the left with a right-wing agenda. This was a really fast change and it's been shocking to me; I still have trouble believing it. What's the hardest is seeing all my conservative friends changing at once and suddenly going from mostly believers in freedom to solid authoritarians in a really short time. Their fundamental philosophy is such the opposite of what it was, and to me this major shift in thinking is a complete mystery. Ironically, they now closely resemble Joe Biden in his younger days of politics. Of course I still know of many people who believe in the old philosophy, but the majority of their former allies no longer do and now regard them as traitors. I can't wrap my head around what's going on here. Big brother is now watching you from both sides. So to the current conservatives out there, what made you decide this is necessary?
post.title: Conservatives, why have you forsaken libertarianism in the past few years?

body:
> There's your problem, you're nihilistic and I doubt I can do much to change that. Until that changes you won't be able to see my point of view.

I'm not, and most of the other people who don't agree with your obsession with destroying da jooz, wahmenz, and blackz aren't either.

> If you've lost the genetic lottery, which you might've claimed, it means you aren't average and your experiences aren't going to be average. Instead of wallowing in nihilism however, you should use your non-average point of view to come to useful edge-case conclusions. The reason why "nature experiments on men" is so fringe men can find unusual paths. You have a purpose, it just seems that you either haven't found or accepted it, or maybe your environment is not conducive to it. You have to keep in mind that nature is metal and makes mistakes of which you might be one, but I doubt it's the case.

So if this applies to me, then why not to women and blacks?

Also I don't think I'm an experiment. One side of my family has always been the more passive, sit-down-and-watch-the-football-game type, so it would make sense for me to not get any genes necessary for high performance. But the other side is more achieving, so basically I ended up having the personality an interests of amazing people like sfrohne, foxite, Seq37, acikek, no_chill, etc. but not the savant level of talent in every area to go along with it. And it's a nightmare.

> It's a big kek when an exceptional female team, top of the country, loses to ordinary 15-year old boys. When you think how many resources and time they wasted to be substandard men, you stop finding it funny, especially when you know how limited they are now. And that's just speaking pragmatically.

Oh okay so boys beat a womens team at one thing so that *proves* that women are that helpless at everything. I doubt you're even being honest about that one event either. And by that logic blacks are the best people too, because they are usually significantly better at athletics.

> Might is right in a sense that if you wield the might, you make the (social construct) rules.

And that's just how it works, but it's not a good thing so if you do end up in that position you should *not* force your agenda. It doesn't give you "right" to control everyone, it means you're able to.

> Black people ARE disaster (have you really not seen the crime stats? How come black-majority spaces are worse off than nuclear-bombed Japanese cities?)

Because of the media and schools constantly screaming to them "BLACK LIVES MATTER, GO OUT AND RIOT AND KILL ALL WHITE PEOPLE, THEY DESERVE IT!".

>  women were used by jews to push the idea (and many other destructive ideas) of bringing them into your countries.

What do women and jews even have to do with black people?

> Women are less capable of making long-term decisions

Why?

> and they even PREFER not to do it when given choice

I tend to agree with that most of the time, so how does that make it necessary to establish a law about it? Must everyone behave like robots imitating your sterotypes exactly?

> just look at the games they CHOOSE to play

What do you mean?

> Which is one of the reasons why I asked how good with strategy you are, it's a serious question I wanted an answer for.

Not good, as with everything else. But among those I know who are unbelievably talented at it are blacks, girls, and jews.

> Speaking of which, what is your Meyers-Briggs personality? Mine is INTP, it was INFP a while ago and I felt quite similarly to you here and there. It seems that only the NT group is inclined to share my point of view.

That's really hard to determine but I think I'm INFP too, but there is one major difference, and it's that I'm usually able to see through my emotions in spite of feeling them. And my blackpilled narrative of being doomed to suck at everything that no one else believes me about is one case of that. I'm curious as to how you think this affects your view of blacks or women, I'd expect it to be the other way around because a feeling person would be more likely to project past experiences and prejudices upon a new person they meet based on faulty similarities that remind them of it.

> Now that sounds really bad.

Yeah, Hitler is a hero and Jesus is a villain, what a rational worldview <sup>/s</sup>.

> He never lied and kept his promises unlike every single modern politician.

Yeah, he "never lied", okay.

> You know his words are true and you can't accept that his intentions were as well because your worldview will crumble with it.

We can only guess what his intentions were, but he was either an evil genius or a beyond crazy psychopath.

> I dare you try deny blacks their stale feelings of grief for slavery, I know you wouldn't.

I just did. That was 200 years ago and guilt is not inherited, so white people today are in no way responsible for slavery.

> Skin colour and gender are consequences of genetics and ALL the traits you have are consequences of genetics as well, they are merely affected by environment to a larger or lesser extent.

Unfortunately yes, but you seem to think that those two traits determine all the other ones. That's not how genetics works, there are trillions of unique traits and they are not derived from skin color and sex.

> I'm saying that the genes responsible for their skin colour are also responsible for their nigging, case in point - https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monoamine_oxidase_A#Aggression_and_the_%22Warrior_gene%22

No, it's not the same gene. It may be more prevalent in people with that gene (for historical reasons), but it's a different one. Also I don't think I'm an experiment. One side of my family has always been the more passive, sit-down-and-watch-the-football-game type, so it would make sense for me to not get any genes necessary for high performance. But the other side is more achieving, so basically I ended up having the personality an interests of amazing people like sfrohne, foxite, Seq37, acikek, no_chill, etc. but not the savant level of talent in every area to go along with it. And it's a nightmare.

It's a big kek when an exceptional female team, top of the country, loses to ordinary 15-year old boys. Black people ARE disaster (have you really not seen the crime stats? How come black-majority spaces are worse off than nuclear-bombed Japanese cities?)

just look at the games they CHOOSE to play

Wdym?

post.body:
It's undeniable that the central tenets of the (US) conservatives used to be small, limited government, states rights, individual liberty, free markets, free speech, etc. With a few exceptions (such as the war on drugs and the death penalty), conservatives were basically a more moderate version of libertarian, and there was a lot of spillover from one to the other.

However in the past few years that has definitely changed. I haven't seen it in its purest form since about a decade ago or maybe even before that, but it's really picked up in the past 1-2 years. Conservatives are now suddenly demanding a strong state, control of the people, censorship, tough laws banning things they determined have a negative impact on society, more restricted individual rights, etc. They've basically become the left with a right-wing agenda. This was a really fast change and it's been shocking to me; I still have trouble believing it. What's the hardest is seeing all my conservative friends changing at once and suddenly going from mostly believers in freedom to solid authoritarians in a really short time. Their fundamental philosophy is such the opposite of what it was, and to me this major shift in thinking is a complete mystery. Ironically, they now closely resemble Joe Biden in his younger days of politics. Of course I still know of many people who believe in the old philosophy, but the majority of their former allies no longer do and now regard them as traitors. I can't wrap my head around what's going on here. Big brother is now watching you from both sides. So to the current conservatives out there, what made you decide this is necessary?

post.body:
Knowing your enemy is necessary to fight them effectively.

About ten years ago on reddit a subreddit called ShitRedditSays was created by SomethingAweful users. Its stated goal was to stomp out misogyny and other badthink on reddit. 

Back then reddit was a pretty nice place. Those were the days of Ron Paul and the place was full of techies and libertarians. You could speak your mind in larger subreddits without being instantly banned. Free speech was still something that was universally valued.

The actual goals of SRS were entirely different. Let's say you and a small group of your friends wanted to take down reddit. How would you go about it? A direct attack would surely fail. But there are tactics that work against larger institutions, and that is using the weaknesses of that institution to make it attack itself from within. 

Their tactics included:

 - Coordination outside of reddit
 - Mass reporting of posts and subreddits
 - Coordinating with the media to publish hit pieces
 - Attacking fringe communities
 - False flag attacks: posting content that was illegal or against reddit rules to get subreddits banned
 - Kept lists of users and subreddits to target
 - Worked with reddit admins or had admin sympathizers

I'm sure there were other, more nefarious tactics used, but I haven't witnessed them personally.

They seem to derive pleasure from exercising their power and destroying what others have built. They are the kind of people who find pleasure in destroying another kid's sandcastle rather than building their own.

Other subreddits were created later, like AgainstHateSubreddits, which used similar tactics. 

Partly through their efforts reddit is what it is today.

That brings us to the cabal that has infested ruqqus. It's obvious they are they same people, if not physically, then in spirit. Their stated goal is ridding ruqqus of nazis and other wrongthink (Ruqqus Correction Project). They keep a [list of badthink guilds](https://ruqqus.com/+AgainstChudGuilds/post/372n/how-to-detox-your-feed-a). They seize guilds with the sole purpose of destroying them, as we've seen recently with +HitlerWasRight and others. They coordinate offsite on discord. 

Behind their outwardly "noble" goals of ridding ruqqus of "nazis" is the same desire to destroy. If they are ever successful at getting rid of "nazis" they will just find some other fringe group to attack. They will not stop until ruqqus is dead.

That brings us to the cabal that has infested ruqqus. It's obvious they are they same people, if not physically, then in spirit. Their stated goal is ridding ruqqus of nazis and other wrongthink (Ruqqus Correction Project). They keep a list of badthink guilds. They seize guilds with the sole purpose of destroying them, as we've seen recently with +HitlerWasRight and others. They coordinate offsite on discord.

Behind their outwardly "noble" goals of ridding ruqqus of "nazis" is the same desire to destroy. If they are ever successful at getting rid of "nazis" they will just find some other fringe group to attack. They will not stop until ruqqus is dead.

post.body:
Long story short, admins and a majority of Ruqqus Discord strongly dislike the current ‚Äúnazi‚Äù - yeah, they use that term unironically - userbase. A good amount of Ruqqord users want to shit on and drive users they don‚Äôt like off the site and admins seem to want to replace their base and cater to a more mainstream audience. These users for all intents and purposes hate Ruqqus and Ruqqus users, would be happier on Reddit, and are consistently (purposely) demoralizing when it doesn‚Äôt make sense to be. Yet the admins seem more than willing to take cues from them.

So you have users that are generally popular or at least neutral with the Ruqqus base getting eyed, jumped on, and treated spitefully by the admins because the Ruqqord base hates and constantly complains about those users. Yet, you‚Äôve got those same Ruqqord users in the RCP server planning brigades, sieging and subverting guilds of users they get banned, playing Carps games and being obnoxious to everybody else and the Admins do nothing.

The admins always side with Ruqqord over the Ruqqus base. Because they don‚Äôt like the Ruqqus base. And, Ruqqord is really just a few loud, whiny people typing the same thing over and over and then the rest just falling in line after they know what to think.

Basically, it seems like they want Reddit‚Äôs userbase and resent the niche that they already have and can build upon because it doesn‚Äôt make Ruqqus look favorable to the mainstream. They don‚Äôt want to promote Ruqqus and refuse to market it until they‚Äôve released Vue and are better able to hide the ‚Äúundesirables.‚Äù

So, if it feels like there‚Äôs animosity towards a bunch of the users here and like they‚Äôre working against you, they kind of are.

That is my experience and take away from being in the Ruqqord

post.body:
Knowing your enemy is necessary to fight them effectively.

About ten years ago on reddit a subreddit called ShitRedditSays was created by SomethingAweful users. Its stated goal was to stomp out misogyny and other badthink on reddit. 

Back then reddit was a pretty nice place. Those were the days of Ron Paul and the place was full of techies and libertarians. You could speak your mind in larger subreddits without being instantly banned. Free speech was still something that was universally valued.

The actual goals of SRS were entirely different. Let's say you and a small group of your friends wanted to take down reddit. How would you go about it? A direct attack would surely fail. But there are tactics that work against larger institutions, and that is using the weaknesses of that institution to make it attack itself from within. 

Their tactics included:

 - Coordination outside of reddit
 - Mass reporting of posts and subreddits
 - Coordinating with the media to publish hit pieces
 - Attacking fringe communities
 - False flag attacks: posting content that was illegal or against reddit rules to get subreddits banned
 - Kept lists of users and subreddits to target
 - Worked with reddit admins or had admin sympathizers

I'm sure there were other, more nefarious tactics used, but I haven't witnessed them personally.

They seem to derive pleasure from exercising their power and destroying what others have built. They are the kind of people who find pleasure in destroying another kid's sandcastle rather than building their own.

Other subreddits were created later, like AgainstHateSubreddits, which used similar tactics. 

Partly through their efforts reddit is what it is today.

That brings us to the cabal that has infested ruqqus. It's obvious they are they same people, if not physically, then in spirit. Their stated goal is ridding ruqqus of nazis and other wrongthink (Ruqqus Correction Project). They keep a [list of badthink guilds](https://ruqqus.com/+AgainstChudGuilds/post/372n/how-to-detox-your-feed-a). They seize guilds with the sole purpose of destroying them, as we've seen recently with +HitlerWasRight and others. They coordinate offsite on discord. 

Behind their outwardly "noble" goals of ridding ruqqus of "nazis" is the same desire to destroy. If they are ever successful at getting rid of "nazis" they will just find some other fringe group to attack. They will not stop until ruqqus is dead.

  • False flag attacks: posting content that was illegal or against reddit rules to get subreddits banned
  • Kept lists of users and subreddits to target
  • Worked with reddit admins or had admin sympathizers

I'm sure there were other, more nefarious tactics used, but I haven't witnessed them personally.

They seem to derive pleasure from exercising their power and destroying what others have built. They are the kind of people who find pleasure in destroying another kid's sandcastle rather than building their own.

Other subreddits were created later, like AgainstHateSubreddits, which used similar tactics.

Partly through their efforts reddit is what it is today.

That brings us to the cabal that has infested ruqqus. It's obvious they are they same people, if not physically, then in spirit. Their stated goal is ridding ruqqus of nazis and other wrongthink (Ruqqus Correction Project). They keep a list of badthink guilds. They seize guilds with the sole purpose of destroying them, as we've seen recently with +HitlerWasRight and others. They coordinate offsite on discord.

Behind their outwardly "noble" goals of ridding ruqqus of "nazis" is the same desire to destroy. If they are ever successful at getting rid of "nazis" they will just find some other fringe group to attack. They will not stop until ruqqus is dead.
post.title: Know Your Enemy

body:
> Do you want civilisation to continue or not? Because ultimately, that's the price of your decision.

No, it was wicked from the beginning, started by people who thought they knew everything and gave themselves excuses to take advantage of other for selfish gain, all being fooled by their insane level of pride and that fallen angel.

> You are bound by your uncontrollable traits, they were given to you by the Universe and you better learn to accept them. You can't control gravity, you're not complaining about being unable to jump 15 feet up, this is no different. Women and men are demonstrably different and therefore need different treatment.

So before you were arguing that my experiences were only exceptions, but now you're saying there are no exceptions?

> I wasn't the one who made the rules. If your planet is getting blasted by a solar flare - it's getting blasted by a solar flare and you're not arguing it. If it's going to be vored by a black hole - it's going to be vored by a violent, mighty black hole and you're not arguing it. It's the laws of the Universe and you and me obey them. The only way you could prevent those two scenarios is by applying a terrific amount of energy (violence) in a constructive way

This is a justification of self-defense only. But what you said was "might is right".

> and if the only way to consolidate that amount of energy in a constructive beam is to restrict women's freedoms then I'm doing it.

Where are you getting these crazy ideas from? Do you think women and black people are magical disaster magnets?

> Dramatise less, fren, your emotions are weighing down on your practical thinking, Your mind seems thoroughly jewed and I'm saying this because you're speaking in Hollywood cliches.

Hollywood actually tries to romanticize those savage civilizations, such as the Renaissance, Ancient Rome, Greece, and Egypt, for supporting humanist worldviews. And you're probably right that my mind is jewed, because I worship one who will end all of this very soon.

> Shut down your biases for a second and watch through [this](https://www.bitchute.com/video/jpIkxc7YnzZa/) and tell me - was this man evil?

It would be silly for a person with an evil agenda to announce it loudly and expect to gain support. Rather, the successful villains are those that are the best at deceiving others, fooling them into letting them do whatever it is they want to do. So no way Hitler is going to publicly announce his plans to commit genocide and dictate everyone's lives and take over the world; he's going to try and maintain a good image so people unwittingly submit to him.

> There aren't any laws that specifically target whites, so how come white genocide happens?

I'm not aware of any white genocide at the current moment, just a bunch of woke SJWs wishing for it.

> My homeland is to remain my homeland and my extended family is having my skin colour and all the billions of traits that come with it.

Again, I already debunked your claim that every single trait is determined by skin color and sex.

> "Skin color" is a dishonest jewish simplification and you better stop using it if you want to remain intellectually honest.

What does this even have to do with jews?

> By "meeting" I mean learning more of them, you don't have to meet one personally to find out they're not really what you pictured them as.

Actually these are mostly people I do know personally.

post.body:
It's undeniable that the central tenets of the (US) conservatives used to be small, limited government, states rights, individual liberty, free markets, free speech, etc. With a few exceptions (such as the war on drugs and the death penalty), conservatives were basically a more moderate version of libertarian, and there was a lot of spillover from one to the other.

However in the past few years that has definitely changed. I haven't seen it in its purest form since about a decade ago or maybe even before that, but it's really picked up in the past 1-2 years. Conservatives are now suddenly demanding a strong state, control of the people, censorship, tough laws banning things they determined have a negative impact on society, more restricted individual rights, etc. They've basically become the left with a right-wing agenda. This was a really fast change and it's been shocking to me; I still have trouble believing it. What's the hardest is seeing all my conservative friends changing at once and suddenly going from mostly believers in freedom to solid authoritarians in a really short time. Their fundamental philosophy is such the opposite of what it was, and to me this major shift in thinking is a complete mystery. Ironically, they now closely resemble Joe Biden in his younger days of politics. Of course I still know of many people who believe in the old philosophy, but the majority of their former allies no longer do and now regard them as traitors. I can't wrap my head around what's going on here. Big brother is now watching you from both sides. So to the current conservatives out there, what made you decide this is necessary?

However in the past few years that has definitely changed. I haven't seen it in its purest form since about a decade ago or maybe even before that, but it's really picked up in the past 1-2 years. Conservatives are now suddenly demanding a strong state, control of the people, censorship, tough laws banning things they determined have a negative impact on society, more restricted individual rights, etc. They've basically become the left with a right-wing agenda. This was a really fast change and it's been shocking to me; I still have trouble believing it. What's the hardest is seeing all my conservative friends changing at once and suddenly going from mostly believers in freedom to solid authoritarians in a really short time. Their fundamental philosophy is such the opposite of what it was, and to me this major shift in thinking is a complete mystery. Ironically, they now closely resemble Joe Biden in his younger days of politics. Of course I still know of many people who believe in the old philosophy, but the majority of their former allies no longer do and now regard them as traitors. body:
And usually 95% of the population is like that. Until 200 years ago almost everyone considered slavery to be completely fine.

In this case, I gave an objective reason why it's an unethical practice: Pinning or otherwise distinguishing something that is not related to moderation is just a cheating mechanism so you can unfairly promote your thoughts above everyone elses'. It doesn't matter if everyone else does it or if you think that's okay or not, that's the way it is. It is a *fact* that you are using it for the purpose of evading the standard voting system and immediately giving yourself the first word. It's extremely tempting to abuse such things and give yourself an advantage, and that's why I think such few people make good mods, or any other type of ruler--you have to be *radically* dedicated to your principles and dealing fairly, or else corruption will surely result. Most people just don't worry about that sort of stuff (unless they are the victim of it), so that's why those who are tend to be a little nuts; but you can almost always trust them to be fair. Ideally though, the centralized power structure would be dismantled entirely.

parent.body: You're debating a strawman here. I did not say majority views are usually correct. I said widely accepted notions are usually correct. 51% is a majority accepted in any democracy. 51% is **not** enough to be a "widely accepted phenomenon". If you want to make a comparison to democracy, that which I define as "widely accepted" is that which is accepted by both left and right, let's say at least 80% of the population - and, like I said, it doesn't mean it's automatically right, it's just likely to be. This was evident by my usage of "it's about _all_ the people doing it". A simple 51% majority is nowhere near "all".
